title: Draven's Primary Champion type shouldn't be 'Marksman'
body:
His profile should read after his stats as:

Attributes
--
Draven
Secondary: Marksman

replies.body:
You mean 
Primary: Draaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaven
Secondary: Draven
Shouldn't it be flipped to match his quote?
No, because he is primarily the more Dravenous version of his name. He is secondarily his name itself.
WTB Dravenous Hydra
Each Draven is more important than the one that it follows

No
His primary is
not Draven
Draaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaven
Or make his primary role "Draven" and make the primary role of every other ADC "Draven wannabe"
Or just " {{champion:119}} " and everyone else is "not {{champion:119}} "
This would be the best April Fools joke ever.

This isn't a joke, 
{{champion:119}} is love
{{champion:119}} is life

> Or make his primary role "Draven" and make the primary role of every other ADC "Draven wannabe"

They should do this is they make a noxus themed event sometime these days.
I understand that this is a joke, but this would confuse new players so no.
This is NOT a joke.
People really do want this. I support it. People will have to try Draven to learn the glory of Draaaaven. Also I want one of the top Google searches to be "Who the hell is Draven?"

Now, take a Draven from this list and share it with a friend. If your friend doesn't automatically become infatuated by the sight of Draven, you may commence the torture and execution in front of a live crowd. Be sure to hype it up too, like letting the person run away before killing them and showing to them just how hopeless he/she is.
